channel.title: Banned
channel.description: UHh hi im streetwav3 I was banned for acting like an idiot and spamming and such. I was told by a mod I was banned for 1 month. It is now well after 1 month and was wondering if I can enjoy the game again now! Thanks.

item.title: Banned
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You’ve been unbanned. Don’t let us see any more nonsense like that from you in the future

Read full topic
